exercise.title: 10.01 Student
exercise.p:
Make a program which contains your student information as a JavaScript object
The student information includes student number, first name, last name, street address, post code and city. Create also two methods to your object. First one returns a string consisting of the full name and the second one returns the whole address. Show this returned information on the web page. (Use the methods you defined while showing the information).
Add the date of birth to the object. Do this separately, adding this new feature to the object after creating the object. (In JavaScript you can always change the objects runtime. Thus JavaScript is so-called prototyping language). Show the information on the web page like this:
